name: Santa Motorbike Racer - Kids Santa Gift Collection
name_original: Santa Motorbike Racer - Kids Santa Gift Collection
description:
Santa Claus is driving a motorbike on highway in speed on Christmas day as someone stole his gifts and spread them on highway road. The highway is full of heavy traffic. Help santa drive fast and collect all of your gifts for you. Try not to let him collide with the traffic on the way or you won't be getting your Chistmas gift this time.

Enjoy Santa Motorbike Racer a fun traffic racing game with santa driving on a bike. Collect the gifts so you can earn coins and from the coins you can buy more beautifull bikes for your Santa Claus.
